data.title: DJ Muggs - Notes & Tones
data.meta_description: Notes & Tones is an album, and a wine. The album: produced by DJ Muggs, made with samples from Sun Ra. There is a limited edition of only two (2) wine-filled LPs. The wine: 2020 vintage - 90% Tocai Friulano/10% Trebbiano old vine grapes from Fox Hill Vineyard in Mendocino County. Note: Please provide your phone num
data.text:
Notes & Tones is an album, and a wine. The album: produced by DJ Muggs, made with samples from Sun Ra. There is a limited edition of only two (2) wine-filled LPs. The wine: 2020 vintage - 90% Tocai Friulano/10% Trebbiano old vine grapes from Fox Hill Vineyard in Mendocino County.

Note: Please provide your phone number for wine orders at check out to ensure that the wine can be delivered. Wine can only be shipped to US addresses and cannot be delivered in Utah.

• Wine-Filled LP + Wine Bundle. Rappcats has just 1 available, of an edition of 2. The LP will be shipped the second week of April 2023.

• Black LP + Wine Bundle. The record plus a bottle of the Notes & Tones wine. The LP will be shipped the second week of April 2023.

• Black LP with OBI + Wine Bundle. Rappcats exclusive OBI wrapped LP, plus a bottle of the Notes & Tones wine. The LP will be shipped the second week of April 2023.

• Black LP. These can be shipped worldwide. Orders will ship the second week of April 2023.

Inspiration: Art Taylor / Stanko Radikon / Xavier Caillard

Following the launch of their Holy Ghost wine and record pairing, DJ Muggs and Egon have teamed up with California’s Broc Cellars and its winemaker Chris Brockway for Notes & Tones: Deep natural wine meets deep jazz and rap samples on vinyl. Read the full story about Notes & Tones.
